name: Time to Dine (TableKnightGames, widmh, MrHusam)
description:
You have only one job. Heat up all the dishes for our hungry customers, and follow the time sheet, cause no one likes burnt food. Make sure to throw away any junk that gets in the way. 

Compete with your friends and climb up the leaderboard to be the world’s best microwave chef!

For best experience downloadable version is recommend.

Controls:

Mouse

Credit:

  • Abdulrahman (Programming) - @tableknightgames
  • Husam (Art) - @mrhusam
  • Wid (Art) - @widmh
  • Ziyad (Backend) - @ZiyadKAG

Game developed during "KAUSTxSandsoft Game Jam" in 48 Hours. All art created from scratch.
